external_references.description: Martin Zugec. (2021, July 27). Deep Dive Into a FIN8 Attack - A Forensic Investigation. Retrieved September 1, 2021.

description: [FIN8](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0061) has used sslip.io, a free IP to domain mapping service that also makes SSL certificate generation easier for traffic encryption, as part of their command and control.(Citation: Bitdefender FIN8 July 2021)
